name: The ones we've lost
description:
Darkness surrounds you. 

How long has it been?

A loud noise, a bright light. 

Hope has found you. 

Chasing away the shadows that enveloped you for so very long. 

A chance to escape from this place. To surface and to see the sun again.

-----------------------------------

This project is currently in an "Atmosphere-Demo" state and was created for the RPG Maker Horror Jam 2021 on itch.io.

The development will continue, but I'd be happy to hear your thoughts on it, in it's current state :)

-----------------------------------

Leo J. alias Mr. Rabbit | 2021
